00069         public void connect()
00070         {
00071             this.sMyConString = "server=" + this.server + ";User Id=" + this.user + ";password=" + this.password + ";Persist Security Info=True;database=" + this.database + ";";
00072             try
00073             {
00074                 this.connection = new MySqlConnection(this.sMyConString);
00075             }
00076             catch (MySql.Data.MySqlClient.MySqlException ex)
00077             {
00078                 switch (ex.Number)
00079                 {
00080                     case 0:
00081                         MessageBox.Show("Cannot connect to server.  Contact administrator");
00082                         break;
00083                     case 1045:
00084                         MessageBox.Show("Invalid username/password when connecting to the database, please contact with an administrator.");
00085                         break;
00086                     default:
00087                         MessageBox.Show(ex.ToString());
00088                         break;
00089                 }
00090             }
00091 
00092         }
00101         public MySqlConnection mycGetConnection()
00102         {
00103             // The connection is forced when its not connected
00104             if (this.connection.State.ToString() == "Closed")
00105             {
00106                 this.connect();
00107                 connection.Open();
00108             }
00109             return this.connection;
00110         }

00124         public List<Hashtable> lhSqlQuery(string sQuery)
00125         {
00126             // The connection is forced when its not connected
00127             if (this.connection.State.ToString() == "Closed")
00128             {
00129                 this.connect();
00130                 connection.Open();
00131             }
00132 
00133             // Create and populate a List.
00134             List<Hashtable> resultset = new List<Hashtable>();
00135             try
00136             {
00137                 MySqlCommand command = this.connection.CreateCommand();
00138                 MySqlDataReader Reader;
00139                 command.CommandText = sQuery;
00140                 
00141                 Reader = command.ExecuteReader();
00142                 Hashtable resultset_tmp;
00143                 int i;
00144 
00145                 while (Reader.Read())
00146                 { 
00147                     resultset_tmp = new Hashtable();
00148                     for (i = 0; i < Reader.FieldCount; i++)
00149                     {
00150                         resultset_tmp.Add(Reader.GetName(i).ToString(), Reader.GetValue(i).ToString()); 
00151                     } 
00152                     resultset.Add(resultset_tmp);
00153                 }
00154             }
00155             catch (Exception ex)
00156             {
00157                 MessageBox.Show(ex.ToString());
00158             }
00159 
00160             return resultset;
00161         }
00162 
00170         public int iInsert(string sQuery)
00171         {
00172             string sLastInsertId = "0";
00173             // The connection is forced when its not connected
00174             if (this.connection.State.ToString() == "Closed")
00175             {
00176                 this.connect();
00177                 connection.Open();
00178             }
00179             try
00180             {
00181                 MySqlCommand command = this.connection.CreateCommand();
00182                 command.CommandText = sQuery;
00183                 command.ExecuteNonQuery();
00184 
00185                 List <Hashtable> result = this.lhSqlQuery("SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() id");
00186                 sLastInsertId = result[0]["id"].ToString();
00187                
00188             }
00189             catch (Exception ex)
00190             {
00191                 // We don't want to show that to the user
00192                 MessageBox.Show(ex.ToString());
00193             }
00194 
00195             this.connection.Close();
00196             return int.Parse(sLastInsertId);

00205         public DataTable dtGetTableForDataGrid(string sQuery)
00206         {
00207             DataTable table = new DataTable();
00208             MySqlDataAdapter MyDA = new MySqlDataAdapter();
00209             try
00210             {
00211                 MyDA.SelectCommand = new MySqlCommand(sQuery, this.mycGetConnection());
00212                 MyDA.Fill(table);
00213             }
00214             catch (MySqlException e)
00215             {
00216                 MessageBox.Show(e.ToString());
00217                 return new DataTable();
00218             }
00219             return table;

00229         public int iDeleteOrUpdate(string sQuery)
00230         {
00231             int iAffectedRows = 0;
00232             // The connection is forced when its not connected
00233             if (this.connection.State.ToString() == "Closed")
00234             {
00235                 this.connect();
00236                 connection.Open();
00237             }
00238             try
00239             {
00240                 MySqlCommand command = this.connection.CreateCommand();
00241                 command.CommandText = sQuery;
00242                 iAffectedRows = command.ExecuteNonQuery();
00243             }
00244             catch (Exception ex)
00245             {
00246                 // We don't want to show that to the user
00247                 MessageBox.Show(ex.ToString());
00248             }
00249 
00250             this.connection.Close();
00251             return iAffectedRows;
00252         }
